#summary Changelog of project versions.
#labels Featured

= Version 0.1.1 =

 * Bug Fix
   * *[http://jira.vtlabs.org/browse/RTPPC-4 RTPPC-4]*: AppData object isn't being passed in the callback methods of RTPProxy-Client API.

= Version 0.1 =

 * Operations
   * *create*: Create a new session with the callee media address;
   * *update*: Update a existing session to create the caller media address;
   * *destroy*: Delete a existent in the RTPPRoxy;

 * Server scheduling
   * *static*: Always use the first server of the configured server list.
   * *round-robin*: Equally balance the requests for all configured servers.
